channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Donald Trump’s media company presents a new type of potential conflicts of interest
item.description: Trump media connects the President-elect’s political allies and his business interests in a decidedly 21st century tech company.

item.title: MicroStrategy’s quirky Nasdaq-100 nod could mean more risk for fund investors
Why Japanese automakers Honda and Nissan are said to be considering a merger
What’s behind the Dow’s current losing streak — and should investors be worried?
Trump's pick to lead NASA made a big bet on crypto while going to space on the side
item.description: Before being nominated by President-elect Trump to lead NASA, Jared Isaacman guided his payments company Shift4 into the crypto market.

item.title: Netflix capitalizes on anxiety-driven millennial nostalgia with Christmas movie formula that’s reviving the careers of former teen stars
item.description: Amidst socioeconomic turmoil, it’s not just the season for holiday movies—it’s the era of them.

item.title: 20 innovative breakthroughs that will transform your health
item.description: We recognize some of the most staggering, game-changing, life-improving developments of the year.

item.title: Dow ends down over 260 points and posts its longest losing streak since 1978
Honeywell’s quantum-computing business could be worth $20 billion
AT&T is dumping hybrid work as it follows Amazon in demanding employees spend 5 days a week in office
item.description: AT&T CEO John Stankey told managers last year they would need to come back to the core office hubs—18,000 returned.

item.title: UK inflation rises to 2.6% in November, in line with expectations
item.description: UK inflation data comes after wage growth quashed any last expectation for a final 2024 rate cut from the Bank of England.

item.title: JPMorgan upgrades a unique, AI-related stock, sees more than 20% upside
item.description: Shares of this artificial intelligence-powered marketplace may be poised for more upside in the coming months, according to JPMorgan.

item.title: UniCredit raises stake in Commerzbank to 28% as Orcel ups ante on pursuit
item.description: Investors are watching whether UniCredit will proceed with a takeover venture of Germany's Commerzbank or Italian peer Banco BPM.

item.title: Will BYD take over Europe’s struggling EV market?
item.description: European automakers should beware—the world’s largest producer of plug-in cars is Chinese and has plans for European electric domination.

item.title: 4 money experts reveal how to reflect on your personal finances — and set goals for 2025
item.description: Feeling guilt about how much you spent this year? Four financial experts have advice that could help you hit your money goals in 2025.
